text: Anna Kanakis () (born in 1962 in Messina, Italy) to a Greek father and an Italian mother, is an Italian actress and model. She was Miss Italy in 1977 at only 15 years old. ==Selected filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
